page.title: 02NEW BUILDING
page.content: Braintree is an expanding town with an ever increasing population. The area is commutable and there is a demand for new and old houses in the town and surrounding villages. Braintree has also been a popular town in the GLC overspill scheme. New housing estates are constantly appearing and the face of Braintree has changed accordingly. Many of the estates are pleasantly ordered with a variety of housing and trees left where possible. The largest number of houses are semi_detached, both private and council. New shops and stores have appeared in the last few years ,in line with housing demands.
